CustomField.description: Temporary field. Inserted value based on a Risk Analysis of how much ERTC Credit the Account is eligible for. This is to be used only until the ERTC Credit expires. To be evaluated in 6 months from creation date to if it needs to be removed/kept/repurposed
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Risk Management-driven data to represent the estimated credit amount for ERTC for a client.
CustomField.label: ERTC Estimated Credit Amount
